title: Cupcakes
shortContent: Cupcakes can go with any occasion and come in lots of different styles. From a simple swirl in your favourite colours, cupcakes adorned with sweets or a special topper to go with your particular event. There's always a reason to eat cupcakes üç•

title: Anniversary Cakes
shortContent: An anniversary is a special occasion which should not be enjoyed without cake! Whether it be a fancy cake to help commemorate a special milestone or a simple cake with a memorable topper üíù

title: Unicorn Cakes
shortContent: Unicorn cakes have been very popular recently, from small unicorn cupcakes to large unicorn cakes in a rainbow of colours. The perfect choice for unicorn fans! ü¶Ñ

title: Children's Birthday Cakes
shortContent: From your childs favourite character to a creation they've dreamt up themselves, a birthday is not complete without a delicious cake.

title: Adult Birthday Cakes
shortContent: Birthday cake isn't just for the kids, don't forget grown ups enjoy cake too!

title: Engagement Cakes
shortContent: What better way to celebrate such a special occasion as an engagement. üíç Share the moment with friends and cake!

title: Seasonal Cakes
shortContent: I've made cakes for all kinds of events such as Christmas cakes, Easter cakes, Halloween cakes, Mothers Day cakes and Fathers Day cakes. Not to mention all the other events that fall throughout the year such as Teacher cakes, Graduation cakes, baby shower cakes and baby reveal cakes. If you're looking for a custom cake get in touch with me and we can discuss your requirements
